text: UPDATED: AUG 2, 2015 Crystal clear, leaves legs behind. Aroma is sweet, rice, fruity. Viscous body, tastes sweet, rice, hints of spices, nice one.
Not a bad one. Especially when it comes to its look. Aroma is a bit too much in the pineapple area with a strange pepper ending. Bit too sweet and bit poor in the rice aroma. But still high quality.
Flaska hemma hos @thaalcoholic (Jonasu). Genomskinlig klar vätska. Frisk fruktig mild doft, ris och gröna äpplen. Stor smak som fyller munnen.

Pours out of the bottle in a clear watery-vanilla colour with smooth to medium body. Aroma of citrus and rice - nice. Taste of citrus, pineapple, mango, straw and flowers - very surprising. Flowery finish with some light acid hints. Nice one but not extraordinary.

Pours crystal clear; the viscous body leaves nice legs behind. The nose includes a rather muted yet pleasant ginjoko; reminiscent of anise and bright fruit notes. While the anise notes resonate on the palate, pepperiness from the alcohol kicks in on the semi-sweet mid-palate; the faint acidity is subtly fresh. The finish is very clean; even at room temperature, the bitterness is very weak. When served chilled, it should be gone without a trace. The mouthfeel is viscous and the body nice and full. Recommended.

Aroma is a byunch of citrusy notes along with some hayish and zesty notes as well. Slight touch of alcohol. Flavour is zesty, hayish, herbal, some slight alcohol as well as mild resiny notes. Nicely balanced, with the alcohol giving it a slight kick.

Bottle 300ml.Clear crystial water colour with no head. Aroma is moderate to light heavy rice, fruity, coconut, pineapple notes. Flavour is moderate sweet to heavy with a average duration. Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is flat, finish feel is light alcoholic. [20120421]
Bottle at Craigs, thank you! Pours a sticky clear colour with aniseed on the nose and in taste.
Bottle thanks to cgarvieuk. Clear, slightly viscous pour. Big aniseed nose, some detergent, slight melon. Slightly dry front, more aniseed, well-hidden alcohol, slightly ginger, pretty nice.
In bottle at Craigs. A clear sake with a coconut, pineapple and alcohol aroma. Similar coconut and pineapple flavours with some aniseed also. Just mildly dry with lingering alcohol. Very tasty!

UPDATED: MAR 17, 2012 Bottle at home ... crystal clear ... sweet alcohol ... rich aniseed ... complex aromatic nose ... sweet front ... light floral flavour ... soft viscour body ... again some aniseed in the linger ... earthy ... definite alcohol ... 

bottle a few weeks old... huge aniseed ... in nose and flavour ... juicy and earthy ... lovimg this 3.9

750ml bottle.
Pours almost water clear, green tinge, no head.
Floral aromas, rice, yeast, honey, peaches, lemon peel, 
Off-dry, medium bodied, no carbonation.
Floral, yeasty taste, honey, peaches, lemon peel, rice. Alcohol a bit burning.
(2012-01-10)
Bottle @ Papsø. Pours a clear very pale yellow color with no head. Has a fruity spicy weak yeasty rice aroma. Sweetish grainy spicy yeasty rice flavor. Has a sweetish grainy spicy yeasty rice finish.

Better know as Dew 33 (san san). Botella. Thin pale bit yellow colour. Rice fruit herbal aroma. ok mouthfeel. Flavour has has fruity herbal sweet like rice to it. Alcohol quite noticeable too. Past its prime.

clear white, no head.
boozy, aroma, rice, 
flavor is fruity, rice, flowers,.
Bottle at Papsøs. Clear very light yellow - no head. Cedar, high cedar aroma, fruity notes, rice, sharpness, light flowery, apples notes, minerals, lovely.

Bottled. A light yellow sake. The aroma has notes of cedar wood, lemon, and rice. The flavor is sweet with notes of rice, cedar wood, alcohol, and lemons, leading to a dry alcoholic finish. Thanks theis for sharing.

Bottle 30 cl. Courtesy of Theis. Pours almost crystal clear with a tint of yellow. Rather sweet aroma with a slight perfuminess. Medium body, a little coconut and ginger - even licorice, but the alcohol dominates leaving a fairly boozy finish. 240811

30 cL clear bottle. Pours clear and with no colour and no head. Aroma is mild rice and smooth fruity. Crisp rice fruity. Light sweet and lingering rice flavoured finish. Light dry note into the far finish.

300 ml bottle. Fruity, spicy aroma, peppery, with pineapple, pear. Slightly yellow-tinged color. Smooth, round, mellow mouth. Very fruity flavor, quite sweet, with pineapple, cherry?, rice, and some alcohol heat. Very tasty, bold, thick, and good, though a bit too sweet.
